spectratmo.datasets.puma¶

PUMA dataset¶

class spectratmo.datasets.puma.PUMADataSet(name='set0', without_sh=False)[source]¶

Bases: spectratmo.datasets.base.DataSetGCM

Data set for PUMA data.

Parameters :

name : str

Short name of the dataset.

without_sh : {False, bool}

Without spherical harmonic operator.

Notes

Before instantiating this class, at least two files have to be prepared:

  • in one of the configuration file of spectratmo (for example $HOME/.spectratmo/config.py), the variables puma_path and puma_path_result_base have to be defined.
  • a config.py file for each set of data (for example in puma_path_result_base + ‘/set0/config.py’) where an iterable instants and a str name have to be defined.

Classes

DataSetGCM([name, path, lmax, nlon, nlat, ...]) Represent a dataset.
File(path[, mode])
GlobalTMeanWithoutBeta(dataset) Handle the basic quantities obtained by global and time averaging.
PUMADataSet([name, without_sh]) Data set for PUMA data.
